entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Fort Liard
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:58 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Liard Airport 8:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
Temperature: -17.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -30
Dewpoint: -20.4°C
Wind: NE 38 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm except 10 cm near the British Columbia border. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:20 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 6:20 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening. Forecast issued 6:20 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
